title: Pixel 1 battery drain
content:
My battery drains very quickly. Read many comments however couldn't see any solution to the problem.
I do not buy the solution with battery replacement for a 3 years old phone used for emails and browsing.
Really disappointed with Google products
1. Pixel 1 is a Google replacement - refurbished as the previous one had a microphone problem
2. Nexus 9 software is not working after 3 years.

Any help please?
